definitions.definition: A sweet-smelling oil or resin derived from various plants.
A plant or tree yielding such substance.

definitions.example: Classical music is a sweet balsam for our sorrows

definitions.definition: A flowering plant of the genus Impatiens.
The balsam family of flowering plants (Balsaminaceae), which includes Impatiens and Hydrocera.
Canada balsam, a turpentine obtained from the resin of balsam fir.
To treat or anoint with balsam.
